data.event: The first inn to accommodate them was built in 1766 by Thomas Bullitt.

event.title: March 21, 2009, two employees of the The Homestead were shot and killed

data.event: On March 21, 2009, two employees of the The Homestead were shot and killed in the hotel kitchen; the community of Hot Springs was briefly locked down under code red procedures as a security precaution.
